text:
How to go from AI images → to videos.

1. Go to Midjourney .com

☑ Start by typing a prompt to generate an image.

2. Then, look at the bottom right side.

☑ Click on 'animate image' with the right settings.
☑ Choose 'Auto' for no input or 'Manual' to guide it.

3. Edit it, or save it.

☑ You can rerun (to get new videos), 
☑ Type a new prompt (to animate it differently), 
☑ Or edit the intensity (low, high) of the animation.

I will share a complete step-by-step guide (for free) at how-to-ai.guide. Join 78,000+ weekly readers.
